entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
